data.title: Providence Affiliated Physicians, St. Mary
data.meta_description: Dr Mohammad Sayer Kanakriyeh, MD is a  physician specializing in Pediatric Cardiology, practicing medicine in San Bernardino. Dr Mohammad Sayer Kanakriyeh, MD practices as a member of Providence Affiliated Physicians, St. Mary
data.text:
Hours

Open Daily, 8 a.m. - 8 p.m.

Note: Due to high volume, please call before departure to verify our hours and availability.

Holiday Hours: 8 a.m. - 5 pm.
